fields.description:
Requesting the ability to use custom views for map annotation bubbles.

I have attached an image to demonstrate what I mean.
fields.summary: Android: Add support for map annotation bubble to be a custom view

comments.body: Can be fixed on Android Maps v2

This issue was previously scheduled to be worked on in more than one sprint:
* 'Release 3.0.1' (on board 'Customer Issues')
* 'Later' (on board '3.1.X Triage')

Starting from JIRA Agile 6.3, an issue can only belong to a single future sprint. Read more about this change: http://docs.atlassian.com/agile/docs-0630/Sprint+Marker+Migration

This issue is now scheduled for future sprint 'Later' (on board '3.1.X Triage').

If this is incorrect, please update the issue accordingly.

This comment was automatically generated by JIRA. If it is no longer relevant, please feel free to delete it.
Closing ticket as duplicate with reference to the linked issues above.
